mapper.select: SELECT act.id,act.title, act.photos, act.activity_time, sub1.title AS subjectLevelOne, sub2.title AS subjectLevelTwo, act.start_time, act.end_time, team.teamname, intro.intro FROM activity act LEFT OUTER JOIN activity_intro intro ON act.id = intro.id LEFT OUTER JOIN team ON act.team_id = team.id LEFT OUTER JOIN activity_subject sub1 ON act.subject_parent_id=sub1.id LEFT OUTER JOIN activity_subject sub2 ON act.subject_id=sub2.id WHERE act.id = #{activityId}

SELECT act.id,act.title,act.apply_max,act.apply_count,act.activity_time,act.start_time,act.end_time,act.photos,intro.intro, act.team_id,team.theme_img,team.theme,team.team_name,sub1.id AS subjectLevelOneId,sub2.id AS subjectLevelTwoId,sub1.title AS subjectLevelOne,sub2.title AS subjectLevelTwo FROM activity AS act LEFT JOIN activity_intro AS intro ON act.id = intro.id LEFT JOIN team ON act.team_id = team.id LEFT JOIN activity_subject AS sub1 ON act.subject_parent_id = sub1.id LEFT JOIN activity_subject AS sub2 ON act.subject_id = sub2.id WHERE act.id = #{id}
